column1: The Pit Room////Hola my Yelp compadres
column2: Â This will be a short but sweet entry. My husband and I was invited to go with a few family members to get some good bbq. We both ordered the 3 meet tray beef rib
column4: brisket and sausage with Mac and Cheese
column6: mustard potato salad. The meats were tender and had the right amount of smoke
column7: but the meat was very bland meaning no flavor(no salt and no pepper). The side were bland at well except for the green beans. Sorry
column8: to disappoint you my friends. No 2nd chances!
